Statute.Title: Prince Rupert Grain Handling Operations Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Manutention des grains à Prince Rupert, Loi sur la)

Minister.Text: Minister of Human Resources Development (SI/93‑142 see also 1996, c. 11, s. 96)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1988, c. 1, s. 12 states that this Act shall come into force on the day immediately after the day on which it is assented to, (assent date being 20.01.88) but not before the twelfth hour after the time at which it is assented to
